title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 32.1 - Purpose of regulation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 32.1 - Purpose of regulation

State Regulations

The purpose of this regulation is to provide for the
publication and alternative means of circulation of notices of the public sale
of delinquent real estate tax receivables by cities with a population of one
million or more. This regulation is adopted pursuant to section
99-s
of
the General Municipal Law, which requires the Comptroller, by rules and
regulations, to: (a) designate a
financial newspaper published and circulated in such city for the publication
of such notices; and
(b) prescribe
an alternative manner for the circulation of such notices. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
32.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
